meanings.definition: To commit oneself to and begin (an enterprise or responsibility)
meanings.sent1: She undertakes the task of cleaning her room every Saturday.
meanings.sent2: He always undertakes his homework as soon as he gets home.
meanings.sent3: The cat undertakes the mission of catching the elusive red dot.
meanings.sent4: The sun undertakes its journey across the sky every day.
meanings.sent5: The determined ant undertakes the challenge of carrying a large crumb back to its nest.

meanings.definition: To promise or agree to do (something)
meanings.sent1: Tom undertakes to help his friend with the school project.
meanings.sent2: She undertakes to finish the report by the end of the week.
meanings.sent3: The dog undertakes to guard the house from any intruders.
meanings.sent4: The wind undertakes to carry the scent of fresh flowers through the air.
meanings.sent5: The knight undertakes to rescue the princess from the dragon's lair.
